channel.title: Countdown in server! help me plz
channel.description: Well i need a countdown timer like in the quest tab or at the top of the screen someone plase give me code for one i need on to count down from 15 minute down to 0 so people no when server is going to restart.

item.title: Countdown in server! help me plz
item.dc:creator: @Massive-Pk Massive-Pk
item.description:
@Massive-Pk wrote:

I Suggest do the command ::update (Amount)

Ex. ::update 60 (1min) 120 (2min) 180 (3min)

But i think no1 can logg on the server while its doing that. it goes up as far as you want it.

Read full topic
